summary: Play as a Nazgul - Ring Wraith - seek out the One Ring to return to the Dark Lord... or become your own master!
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i1371.photobucket.com/albums/ag308/CelestialVengeance/lotr_naz_logo_zps783e6fd6.png[/img][center][/center]Play as an undead wraith with the power of swordsmanship and sorcery at your command. Summon the other 8, call a Black Horse of Mordor, unleash a powerful scream that will make all mortals nearby flee from you! Inspire fear and sickness where ever you go with your Black Breath.


vv        FOR THE LOVE OF THE 8 DIVINES    vv
------------------------------------------------------------
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/2259634-lotr-the-nazgul/]LOTR - Nazgul Race Thread[/url]
------------------------------------------------------------
^^ PLEASE REVIEW THIS THREAD FOR INFO ^^


All information related to the project can be found in the link above. Please note this mod is a [b][i][u][font=Courier New][color=#ffff00][size=3]WORK IN PROGRESS[/size][/color][/font][/u][/i][/b], and credit links are also included in the thread.
REQUIRES[i]: DAWNGUARD [/i]AND [i]DRAGONBORN [/i]DLC

[u]I AM:[/u]
[list][*][size=2]Accepting positive criticism, suggestions, help (like with why I can't get the nazgul screech WAV files playing when using a power or spell...)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Accepting help in regards to modeling/textures for the upcoming Phase 2/3 of the project (details in thread)[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
[b][u]I AM NOT:[/u][/b][/size][list][*][size=2]Making the NazgulRaceVampire portion, please keep this in mind when downloading this mod as you might not be able to do the Dawnguard quests with Volkihar.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Working with models/textures myself as I don't really know how. Sure scripting is easy but graphics? :P[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2][url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/2259634-lotr-the-nazgul/]
[/url][/size]


CREDITS:
The First and foremost J.R.R. Tolken for his wonderful works that inspired many of us LotR, Hobbit, Simarillion fans :)
Peter Jackson for his LOTR movies that no doubt started the interest from the Nazgul Race Beta mod (which this mod is a continuation of)
Isilmeriel - LOTR Weapons - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5727/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5727/?[/url]
LeGioN675 - Return of the Witch King (not used yet, waiting for permission, but you should still check out his mod if you want to use Witch King items) - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24124/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24124/?
[/url]
Tx12001 for helping me with how to make perks

514Y32 - The One Ring mod (studied to create the wraith world and sound fx)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35920/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35920/?[/url]

And of course the big guy: Sergeynest for creating the Nazgul Race beta in which this project was continuing - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17036/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17036/?[/url]
author: lordvalinar
